channel.title: Whats wrong with this Object ID?
channel.description:
:D object = 1928 5002 3694 10 10 0 spotlight!
why isn't the spotlight respawning can someone help me?

item.title: Whats wrong with this Object ID?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

The last integer should be 10; 10 represents most, if not all the object you will ever add.

Read full topic
item.source: Whats wrong with this Object ID?

item.title: Whats wrong with this Object ID?
item.dc:creator: @cj_own_u cj own u
item.description:
@cj_own_u wrote:

well idk if a spot light is different, but to add objects like banks, you don’t go to worldobjects.cgf

you go into client.java

search up

public void NewObjects() {

and you should see something like this:

makeGlobalObject(2510, 3863, 2783, -3, 10);// Anvil makeGlobalObject(2843, 2964, 61, -3, 10); // Ancient Alter makeGlobalObject(3042, 4843, 2781, 0, 10);// Furnace makeGlobalObject(2378, 3438, 2287, -1, 10);// Obstacle Pipe makeGlobalObject(2380, 3440, 2193, 0, 10);// Chest makeGlobalObject(2383, 3427, 3816, 1, 10);// Kitchen Drawers makeGlobalObject(2381, 3438, 4172, -1, 10); // Range makeGlobalObject(2854, 3957, 61, 2, 10); // Ancient Alter makeGlobalObject(2868, 9883, 2213, 0, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(2868, 9882, 2213, 0, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(2868, 9881, 2213, 0, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3088, 3934, 2213, 1, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3088, 3933, 2213, 1, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(2859, 9881, 2213, 0, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(2859, 9882, 2213, 0, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(2742, 9499, 2213, 0, 10); // bank

except probably more.

and so you just add the things to the list, for spotlight if you got ur codes right, you would go:
makeGlobalObject(pos x, pos y, id, face, 10); // (name)

the “face” is which direction it is facing, keep playing around with it, -3 through 0, untill you get it facing the way you want.

idk wht the 10 is, but that’s wht all the other things have so just go with the flow, and it works.
that is about it
hope that works.

Read full topic
item.source: Whats wrong with this Object ID?
